mapper.select: select e.EMPNO as emp_empno, e.ENAME as emp_ename, e.JOB as emp_jpb, e.MGR as emp_mgr, e.HIREDATE as emp_hiredate, e.SAL as emp_sal, e.COMM as emp_comm, e.DEPTNO as emp_deptno, d.DEPTNO as dept_deptno, d.DNAME as dept_dname, d.LOC as dept_loc from emp e left outer join dept d on d.deptno = e.deptno

select e.EMPNO as emp_empno, e.ENAME as emp_ename, e.JOB as emp_jpb, e.MGR as emp_mgr, e.HIREDATE as emp_hiredate, e.SAL as emp_sal, e.COMM as emp_comm, e.DEPTNO as emp_deptno, d.DEPTNO as dept_deptno, d.DNAME as dept_dname, d.LOC as dept_loc from emp e left outer join dept d on d.deptno = e.deptno order by E.EMPNO OFFSET #{firstItem}-1 ROWS FETCH NEXT #{itemsPerPage} ROWS ONLY

select e.EMPNO as emp_empno, e.ENAME as emp_ename, e.JOB as emp_jpb, e.MGR as emp_mgr, e.HIREDATE as emp_hiredate, e.SAL as emp_sal, e.COMM as emp_comm, e.DEPTNO as emp_deptno, d.DEPTNO as dept_deptno, d.DNAME as dept_dname, d.LOC as dept_loc from emp e left outer join dept d on d.deptno = e.deptno where e.empno = #{empno}
